content.prompt: Which of the following was a result of the Dawes Severalty Act of 1887 ?

choices.label: It encouraged cooperative landownership among American Indians.
American Indians in the West led attacks on United States forts.
American Indians lost control of millions of acres of land.
American Indians and Whites challenged each other over landownership in range wars.
Most American Indians were relocated to the west of the Mississippi.

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
